tool_description: SkySignature is an online Digital Signature application. Fast, Easy and straight forward. Free for personal use. Very flexible and intuitive. It is fully loaded with many helpful features and PDF editing tools such as "type anywhere" capability available exclusively only on SkySignature.com. More features such as Sign-Here tags that can be dragged and dropped onto the document. Allows to create a new PDF document out of the individual pages from existing PDF Documents. SkySignature uses a custom, unique advanced encryption algorithm to ensure security.
name: SkySignature
title: SkySignature

api_list.name: /skysignature
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://skysignature-skysignature-v1.p.rapidapi.com/skysignature"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skysignature-skysignature-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
